author: Rick Spilman
content:
Irwin,

The Kharg is described as a training and logistics ship, so I would imagine the extra crew were cadets or trainees.

author: Irwin Bryan
content:
Did the Karg really have 400 crewmembers? Were they like a marine detachment or did they have other roles on the ship?

Have a great day!

author: Paul Matthew Webb
content: Another triumphant Iran vessel,they can all sink as far as I care….
